body:
Hi all!



I've succeeded on using and adapting the shading design with ladybug.

now I am trying to set the daylight analysis but I get an error notice and I can't understand where is my mistake.



I'm attaching the files.



my next step will be optimizing the shades and the natural light. how do you suggest on doing that?



Thank you very much!



Noa

replies.body:
Noa,

I believe the file you attached is not the one having the problem.

-A.
you are right. I'll upload the correct file tomorrow.

hi Abraham,



I'm attaching the correct file.



Noa

The file is correct but the geometry is not internalised (or the rhino file is needed also).

-A.
Just from reading the error message one of the point inputs are null. You need to clean the list of points before creating the recipe.
what do you mean? how do I do it?

It means that (at least) one of your test points is faulty (null in this case). So Mostapha's suggestion is to clean/cull such null points BEFORE you pass them through.

-A.
